feed.title: David Stempien
feed.subtitle: This is my public web site. I don't do social media, and you shouldn't either. # baseurl: "" # the subpath of your site, e.g. /blog # url: "" # the base hostname & protocol for your site, e.g. http://example.com

entry.title: First Post
entry.content: Hi there! This is the first post from my new blog at stempien.live. I’m building this site using Jekyll which I just learned about while attending a work conference last week. For quite awhile now I’ve been toying with the idea of having a presence on the web which wasn’t tied to any social media platform. You know, like the web used to be in the 1990’s.
entry.summary: Hi there! This is the first post from my new blog at stempien.live. I’m building this site using Jekyll which I just learned about while attending a work conference last week. For quite awhile now I’ve been toying with the idea of having a presence on the web which wasn’t tied to any social media platform. You know, like the web used to be in the 1990’s.
